title: Unbeatable Price in Roswell!! Weekly Special!!!
posting_body: At Economy Hotel Roswell, we specialize in helping individuals who are struggling with finding affordable accommodation.
No deposit & no credit check required!
Weekly fee is $225 (*taxes & fees not included).
It includes ALL utilities and services!
THE ECONOMY HOTEL OPERATES AS A HOTEL AND NOT AN APARTMENT COMPLEX.
THIS ADD IS INTENDED FOR MARKETING PURPOSES OF THE ECONOMY HOTEL
